Title: CS 537 - Processes, Part III (Implementation)
Body: Since we will only used critical sections to protect short operations (see the implementation of semaphores above ), it is reasonable to assume that a process that has done begin_cs will soon do end_CS , but the converse is not true:  There's no reason to assume that the other process will want to enter its critical section any time in the near future (or even at all!).
